durakathana wishleshana warthawa labena thek polis kandayama mema abirahas ghathanaye thorathuru soyabalima digatama karagena yame prathipalayak washayen wijethunga mahaththayage niwase kamarayak kuliyata gena mita wasarakata pamana ihathadi guwan hamuda sebaleku padinchiwa sita athi bawa danaganimata labi atha.me guwan hamuda sebala guwan hamudawa wisin pawathwagena giya gadol kapime wyapruthiyakata sahabhagiwimata pamina siti ayeki.2006 wasare sita wijethunga mahaththayage gedara kamarayak kuliyata gena nawathan gena siti me guwan hamuda sebala 2007 wasare yannata gos atha.wijethunga mahaththaya guwan hamuda sebala gedarin pannagena athayi kiyanne ohuge mudal soraganna bawata chodana karamini.bingiriye gedarin eda pitawagiya pasu guwan hamuda sebala aaye kisima dinaka wijethunga mahaththayage gedarata pamina thibuneda natha.polis kandayama karana lada wadidura soya balimwaladi me thorathuru heliwi thibini.game bohodenek polis kandayamata pawasa thibune guwan sebala game paththa palathakawath pasugiya wasara 12 ka kalaya thula pamina gos thibune nathi nisa meyata kisiseth ohuge sambandhayak thibimata nohaki yayi kiyaya.me guwan hamuda sebala hanguranketha rikillagaskada adhikarigama gammanaye padinchi ayek bawatada thorathuru polisiya anawaranaya karagaththeya.upapolis parikshakawarayage jangama durakathana wishleshana warthawa da me atharawaraye polis kandayama athata pathwa thibini.guwan sebala pariharanaya karana jangama durakathanaye simpatha wishramika upapolis parikshakawarayage jangama durakathanayata dama amathum labagena athi bawa ee ha sambandhawa kerunu thakshanika parikshanawalin thahawuru wiya.
ee lakuna nisa samaharawita samaharak denata sammanaya nolabi yannata athi.
